Articles.Content:
Hey there I'm Demonbob, I have been playing ksp since .13 and been lurking around the forums for about as long.

Today I decide to show myself to the community. Hope to share with all of you in the near future.

About me:

I'm 22, work as a mechanic for flight simulators.

I'm french canadian.(So I apologize for all them mistakes I make while writing )

Here are some of my KSP accomplishments so far:

Landed on mun, minmus, duna and jool

Crashed on eve.

Nice to meet you all and have a nice day!

Hi Demonbob, welcome to the community

Good to meet you too, I hope you manage to land on Eve as well, have fun flying
